posts.post_content:
Hi, I'm looking to complete my first purchase here but have over 100 positive transactions on ebay (same username if you'd like to verify).

I'm looking for a graded Christy Mathewson Dark Cap, either PSA or SGC in any back. Probably a 2-4 with nice eye appeal. Please let me know if you have any that you're willing to sell!
Still looking if anyone has one to sell
